Journal.Title: Revista espanola de cirugia ortopedica y traumatologia

Article.ArticleTitle: [Paravertebral and intra-abdominal abscess due to oxygen-ozone therapy for lower back pain].

AbstractText: Complications secondary to oxygen-ozone therapy are rare, but they have been described in medical literature. There are only two cases of infectious complications after oxygen-ozone therapy. Our aim is to describe a rare case of purulent complication that was secondary to oxygen-ozone therapy for the treatment of lower back pain. We report the clinical improvement with conservative treatment for a local complication after percutaneous oxygen-ozone treatment. According to the clinical improvement of our patient, conservative treatment should be considered before any aggressive surgery.
